title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 254 - Joint Collection And Enforcement Activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 254 - Joint Collection And Enforcement Activity

State Regulations
§ 254.1 - Joint assessment of taxes and proportionate division of payment
§ 254.2 - Joint collection and enforcement activity by the State Tax Commission
§ 254.3 to 254.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 254

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1332[a]; Codes and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-92[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
